name: Services Middleware System
short_description:
A Middleware System for Services like:

. Service Log, Syslog
. Service Email, Gmail, SMS, ICS, Mailing
. Service Data, File, Report, ODF, PDF
. Service Networking, Ping, SSH, Telnet
. Service Monitor
. Service Automation
. Service RaspberryPI, Linux ARM Board,  Arduino, Grove, UPS, Inverter
. Service Proxy, Backup, Cluster
. Others

The idea is to use a RDBMS middleware, between Services and Clients, to  semplify Clients developing. The RDBMS is Postgresql, the SDK is Qt, the operating system is Ubuntu Server. 
The main application, service_manager, polls with the commands table and executes   processes of the required services. 
A Client accesses to different services in a same manner, reading and write database tables.
So it is possible to realize a Client in any programming language, the only need is to acccess to Postgresql tables.  

Other tools and informations in www.pierluigilucio.it
summary: Middleware Postgresql based to access services.
